decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location plan, block plan and 85/MR/03 received on 08/04/2014 and Amended plans 85/MR/01/A and 85/MR/02/A received 08/09/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The extension hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 85 Martindale Road TW4 7EW.
description: Retropsective application for the erection of a single storey rear extension and replacement of existing side infill extension.
